    standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make

    web

    sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on
    purpose (injected humour and the like).
earlylife: Achyuta Rao, born on January 1, 1961, hails from Jilkapally, near Pochampally in Nalgonda district. His zeal to serve the people and make an impact for the masses led him to join the All India Youth Federation when he was in his late teens and through his involvement in that, he later noticed the kind of troubles children were facing and he revived Bala Sangham in 1985 and served as the president of that till 2011. From his early days as a child rights activist, Achyuta Rao was extremely active, rescuing hundreds of children from the clutches of begging mafia, child labour and more.

In addition to being actively involved in rescuing and rehabilitation, he also conducted several summer camps for children, training them in martial arts, drawing, dance and more. He brought in experts in these avenues to conduct classes in the camps, ensuring the children learn the said skills from the best in the city.
